class.rdfs:comment: A CDCPMDRecord is a data structure representing a record in a CDC tabular data format used for hospital data reporting. See documentation for details, and the linked CDC materials for authoritative definitions used as the source here.
class.rdfs:label: CDCPMDRecord

schema:cvdCollectionDate.rdfs:comment: collectiondate - Date for which patient counts are reported.
schema:cvdCollectionDate.rdfs:label: cvdCollectionDate

schema:cvdFacilityCounty.rdfs:comment: Name of the County of the NHSN facility that this data record applies to. Use cvdFacilityId to identify the facility. To provide other details, healthcareReportingData can be used on a Hospital entry.
schema:cvdFacilityCounty.rdfs:label: cvdFacilityCounty

schema:cvdFacilityId.rdfs:comment: Identifier of the NHSN facility that this data record applies to. Use cvdFacilityCounty to indicate the county. To provide other details, healthcareReportingData can be used on a Hospital entry.
schema:cvdFacilityId.rdfs:label: cvdFacilityId

schema:cvdNumBeds.rdfs:comment: numbeds - HOSPITAL INPATIENT BEDS: Inpatient beds, including all staffed, licensed, and overflow (surge) beds used for inpatients.
schema:cvdNumBeds.rdfs:label: cvdNumBeds

schema:cvdNumBedsOcc.rdfs:comment: numbedsocc - HOSPITAL INPATIENT BED OCCUPANCY: Total number of staffed inpatient beds that are occupied.
schema:cvdNumBedsOcc.rdfs:label: cvdNumBedsOcc

schema:cvdNumC19Died.rdfs:comment: numc19died - DEATHS: Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 who died in the hospital, ED, or any overflow location.
schema:cvdNumC19Died.rdfs:label: cvdNumC19Died

schema:cvdNumC19HOPats.rdfs:comment: numc19hopats - HOSPITAL ONSET: Patients hospitalized in an NHSN inpatient care location with onset of suspected or confirmed COVID-19 14 or more days after hospitalization.
schema:cvdNumC19HOPats.rdfs:label: cvdNumC19HOPats

schema:cvdNumC19HospPats.rdfs:comment: numc19hosppats - HOSPITALIZED: Patients currently hospitalized in an inpatient care location who have suspected or confirmed COVID-19.
schema:cvdNumC19HospPats.rdfs:label: cvdNumC19HospPats

schema:cvdNumC19MechVentPats.rdfs:comment: numc19mechventpats - HOSPITALIZED and VENTILATED: Patients hospitalized in an NHSN inpatient care location who have suspected or confirmed COVID-19 and are on a mechanical ventilator.
schema:cvdNumC19MechVentPats.rdfs:label: cvdNumC19MechVentPats

schema:cvdNumC19OFMechVentPats.rdfs:comment: numc19ofmechventpats - ED/OVERFLOW and VENTILATED: Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 who are in the ED or any overflow location awaiting an inpatient bed and on a mechanical ventilator.
schema:cvdNumC19OFMechVentPats.rdfs:label: cvdNumC19OFMechVentPats

schema:cvdNumC19OverflowPats.rdfs:comment: numc19overflowpats - ED/OVERFLOW: Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 who are in the ED or any overflow location awaiting an inpatient bed.
schema:cvdNumC19OverflowPats.rdfs:label: cvdNumC19OverflowPats

schema:cvdNumICUBeds.rdfs:comment: numicubeds - ICU BEDS: Total number of staffed inpatient intensive care unit (ICU) beds.
schema:cvdNumICUBeds.rdfs:label: cvdNumICUBeds

schema:cvdNumICUBedsOcc.rdfs:comment: numicubedsocc - ICU BED OCCUPANCY: Total number of staffed inpatient ICU beds that are occupied.
schema:cvdNumICUBedsOcc.rdfs:label: cvdNumICUBedsOcc

schema:cvdNumTotBeds.rdfs:comment: numtotbeds - ALL HOSPITAL BEDS: Total number of all Inpatient and outpatient beds, including all staffed,ICU, licensed, and overflow (surge) beds used for inpatients or outpatients.
schema:cvdNumTotBeds.rdfs:label: cvdNumTotBeds

schema:cvdNumVent.rdfs:comment: numvent - MECHANICAL VENTILATORS: Total number of ventilators available.
schema:cvdNumVent.rdfs:label: cvdNumVent

schema:cvdNumVentUse.rdfs:comment: numventuse - MECHANICAL VENTILATORS IN USE: Total number of ventilators in use.
schema:cvdNumVentUse.rdfs:label: cvdNumVentUse

schema:datePosted.rdfs:comment: Publication date of an online listing.
schema:datePosted.rdfs:label: datePosted
